alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 06 at 10:05PM MST until July 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE GRAND CANYON... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures in excess of 110 degrees near Phantom Ranch. * WHERE...Grand Canyon Country...specifically near Phantom Ranch. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities at the Grand Canyon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Plan to recreate early in the morning, and avoid the hottest daytime temperatures. Hikers should have adequate gear...including a wide- brimmed hat... sunscreen...salty snacks...sufficient water and electrolyte mix. Doubling your calorie intake helps maintain your energy.
